summary: Small and easy to use cheat file for those of you who hate typing in each cheat, one by one.
descriptionHtml:
Small and easy to use cheat file for those of you who hate typing in each cheat, one by one. The file will make doing the following much easier.

===News Bulletin!===
I will be working on the file in a day or two. I have gone over the comments and I will make custom files for those that have requested them.

==Cheats==
Adds all perks
Sets all skills to 9999
Adds 9999999 gold
Turns on god mode
Reveals all map markers

==Version 1.1==
All missing perk codes added
Adds 99 lockpicks
Adds 100 dragon souls

==Version 1.2==
The \"Sets all skills to 9999\" Cheat only works 50% of the time bug is now fixed
All skills should now be added when you use the cheat

Please let me know if any part of this mod does not work.

==Known Bugs==
The \"Sets all skills to 9999\" Cheat only works 50% of the time (Fixed in latest version)
Some users have experienced a bounty bug (File does not cause it)

==Install Info==
Put the .txt file in your main Skyrim directory. Where the .exe is located.

==How To Use==
Open the console and type \"bat <filename>\" In this case the file name is Cheats but you can change it to anything you want.

==Custom files==
Want a custom cheat mod made just for you? Leave a comment telling me what you want and I will make it for you.
author: Slayer113
